thread.section_title: Blinds 2go Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blinds 2go | www.blinds-2go.co.uk | 11 of 2268
thread.title: RW

author: RW
title: RW
text:
Really happy with our purchase, the blind is of a high quality (no cheap cardboard tubing on show like some we've seen) has a nice action and the colour was a perfect match for the room. It even includes child safety fittings as standard which given it was for a nursery was perfect.
Delivery was timely too.
We looked at a few bespoke blind sites and found the price competitive.
So on the whole a good experience and will definitely use Blinds2Go in future.
